bibl.title: The Changing Self of the Magician According to the Greek Magical Papyri.
Hans Dieter BETZ, Antike und Christentum. Gesammelte Aufsätze. IV
bibl.author: BETZ, Hans Dieter

bibl.note: [Unpublished.] - 1. Ancient Notions of Changing the Self. - 2. Pronouncements Using "I am". - 3. Two Types of Changing the Self. - 4. Some Conclusions.
BETZ Hans Dieter, The Changing Self of the Magician According to the Greek Magical Papyri.
Hans Dieter BETZ, Antike und Christentum. Gesammelte Aufsätze. IV (Tübingen, 1998) pp. 175-186.
